name: The Shrooms Have Eyes
description:
The white mage Necro awakes to find some villainous mage has given life to a multitude of inanimate objects all across the forest. It's your job to take back their lives and restore order. However, each life-zapping blast takes a bit of your own life away! You'll need to recharge your power by defeating enemies, or absorbing their attacks!

I had no time to finish this...so it's kinda left anticlimatic. Every game jam is a learning experience, though, and I got pretty far for just a few days by myself.
